translations: 使贬职；使降级（relegate 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: She was then relegated to the role of assistant.
sentences.translation: 随后她被降级做助手了。

sentences.sentence: He relegated the incident to the back of his mind.
sentences.translation: 他将这个事件抛到了脑后。

sentences.sentence: This agency will be relegated to the backwaters of Washington.
sentences.translation: 这个机构将被移到华盛顿闭塞落后的地方。
